_source.short_desc: Delivers unparalleled power, flexibility, reliability, ease-of-use; comprehensive EDI for practices of any size/specialty, and RCM co's
_source.long_desc: MedicsPremier delivers unparalleled power, flexibility, reliability, and ease-of-use while providing increases in efficiency with comprehensive EDI, workflow, reporting scheduling and more.  Excellent for the PM needs of any practice or RCM co.  Handles Behavioral Health, Radiology and Anesthesia billing.  System integrates with credit card processing, automated phone reminders and business intelligence dashboards for unparalleled data mining and analysis. On schedule for ICD-10 compliance.
_source.target_audience: All primary care and specialties including Anesthesiology, Behavioral Health/Substance Use Disorders, Labs, and Radiology. HCFA/UB/workers comp/No-Fault claims; outpatient and inpatient facilities.

related_products.short_desc: Make the switch today to see why 100,000+ health and wellness entrepreneurs trust SimplePractice to run their business.
related_products.features: Focus on clients while SimplePractice does the rest. Maximize your availability by giving clients the option to request appointments online. After you approve a request, you can send paperless intakes and insurance forms directly from the Client Portal. Set up AutoPay to get paid on time, every time. Reduce no-shows with unlimited appointment reminders. Work on-the-go with our mobile app and integrated telehealth platform. Sign up for a free, 30-day trial today to try it out for yourself.

related_products.short_desc: NextGen Healthcare practice management solutions improve patient care, boost staff satisfaction, and enhance revenue.
related_products.features: NextGen Healthcare practice management solution NextGen? Office Practice Management (1-10 physicians) and NextGen? Enterprise Practice Management (10+ physicians) support all aspects of running a healthcare business. With claim denial management, automated eligibility checks, a proprietary clearinghouse, a patient portal, and drag and drop scheduling, practices can save time, improve patient care, boost staff satisfaction, enhance revenue, and engage patients in their own healthcare.

related_products.short_desc: 10to8 is Medical Practice Management Software trusted by clinics & hospitals worldwide. Get started today.
related_products.features:
10to8 is Medical Practice Management Software trusted by clinics & hospitals worldwide.

10to8 allows for multi-office and multi-physician setup so it is a great tool for bigger medical practices. 

Through 10to8?s booking page, scheduling is easy both for patients & physicians. Reduce no-shows with automated SMS & email reminders. Empower patients to manage their appointments through the patient portal.

Keep Protected Health Information safe with our HIPAA tools. Get started today.

related_products.short_desc: DrChrono Practice Management, cloud-based and fully integrated with EMR and billing streamlines and improves your practice operation.
related_products.features: DrChrono offers an integrated practice management software that can be tailored to meet the unique needs of your practice. Whether small or big, equip yourself with the system that will enable you to build the practice you?ve dreamt of. Streamline your practice with a 100% digital solution that offers you real time eligibility check, automated reminders, task management, single data entry, integrated billing, online check-in and more. For students please visit DrChrono University.

related_products.short_desc: Enables interactive online eligibility verification, claims submission, and reporting for a low subscription fee.
related_products.features:
NueMD is the leading cloud-based medical management solution for small and mid-sized  practices. NueMD offers secure, HIPAA-compliant access to software that streamlines the patient care cycle and simplifies administrative tasks to just a few key strokes. 
NueMDs established client base of over 24,000 users in 50 states is proof of our success. Increase your profitability while better serving your patients with NueMD.

related_products.short_desc: Medical practice management solution that helps businesses with insurance billing, CMS 1500 forms filling, payment tracking, and more.
related_products.features: Speedy  Claims is possibly the easiest to use software available anywhere for billing your patients and insurance companies whether  by paper or electronically. An easy to use point and click interface showing the actual CMS 1500 form on the screen makes filling out a claim simple and coupled with our error checking scrubber makes it accurate and powerful.  Try us free for 30 days!

related_products.short_desc: Run simpler, streamlined medical business operations and maximize revenue with RXNT's integrated Practice Management software.
related_products.features: RXNT's cloud-based Medical Practice Management (PM) system enhances practice-related workflows, from billing and collections, scheduling, appointment reminders, insurance eligibility, charge capture, assigning ICD-10 codes, and remittance. And, single sign-on (SSO) simplifies operations for central billing offices. Our feature-rich Medical Billing and Scheduling system comes with configurable reporting, automated claims checks, online patient bill pay, and mobile apps for iOS and Android.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud image management platform improves physician and administrative productivity and increases patient satisfaction.
related_products.features: Ambra Health is a cloud-based medical image management platform. Intuitive, scalable and highly interoperable, the Ambra cloud platform is designed to serve as the backbone of imaging innovation and progress for healthcare providers. With Ambra, medical practices have transformed the way they manage medical images, improving collaboration with referring physicians and patient safety while reducing costs. Platform includes image upload, exchange, scalable storage, viewing, and EHR integration.

related_products.short_desc: eClinicalWorks is a leader in healthcare IT, providing innovative, customizable Electronic Health Record (EHR) and Practice Management.
related_products.features: eClinicalWorks is a privately held leader in healthcare IT, providing comprehensive Electronic Health Record (EHR) and Practice Management (PM) solutions used by more than 850,000 providers in more than 20 countries.

related_products.short_desc: Send secure intake and consent forms privately to your clients. HIPAA compliant, e-signature support, online booking and payment
related_products.features:
IntakeQ provides beautiful and secure electronic intake forms for health professionals, enabling them to offer an amazing onboarding experience, while also optimizing and streamlining the intake process.

As a bonus, IntakeQ also offers powerful practice management features, including scheduling, payment, appointment reminders, secure messaging, telehealth, invoicing and insurance billing.

Affordable pricing, 14-day free trial, no credit card required, no software to install.

related_products.short_desc: Everything you need to run a better practice. Practice management software that offers charting, scheduling, billing, payments & more.

Everything you need to run a better practice.

similar_products.short_desc: Focus on giving excellent medical care and let vcita handle the rest. Automate tasks and manage your entire practice from one app.

related_categories.description: Electronic Medical Records software (EMR) automates the documentation, storage and retrieval of patient records. EMR software streamlines data entry, automates diagnosis and CPT code selection, minimizes required paper records, reduces transcription costs, provides up-to-date patient histories and reduces the turnaround time for patient visits and retrieving lab results. Using Electronic Medical Records solutions, doctors, offices and healthcare organizations save time, reduce medical errors, perform less paperwork and provide more accurate diagnoses for their patients. Electronic Medical Records software is related to Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

_source.short_desc: MedicsPremier: excellent for any size setting; multiple tax IDs, comprehensive EDI, scheduling, reports/analytics. Great also for RCMs.
_source.long_desc:
MedicsPremier is a highly comprehensive financial/revenue cycle/operations/mobility platform that drives maximized revenue from insurance payers and patients while creating extraordinary, hands-off   efficiencies.

Wide-ranging EDI, 2021 E/M coding, NCCI edits, out-of-network alerts, tools for capturing patient responsibility amounts, powerful scheduling that works to protect revenue in advance, wide-ranging, user-defined financial/operational analytics/dashboards/KPIs.
_source.target_audience: All primary care and specialties including Anesthesiology, Behavioral Health/Substance Use Disorders, Labs, and Radiology. HCFA/UB/workers comp/No-Fault claims; outpatient and inpatient facilities.

related_products.short_desc: NextGen Healthcare provides ambulatory practices with award-winning solutions along with dedicated support & professional services.

related_products.short_desc: Mental health EMR & therapy notes software for practices of all sizes. Lots of features and reports. Free 21 day trial

Sync with Google/iCal. Voice, text, email reminders. 
Tons of reports included: Payroll, Staff Billing, etc. 
Unlimited document storage, unlimited support.

Our mobile IOS apps means you and your staff are never out of touch with your practice. Improve your physician/patient workflow with AdvancedEHR. Healthier practice = healthier patients.

related_products.short_desc: RXNT's cloud-based EHR software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient experience. Affordable pricing, free setup and support.
related_products.features:
RXNT's cloud-based Electronic Health Records (EHR) software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient care experience. Providers get real-time health and prescription history at the point-of-care, as well as electronic referrals, medical scheduling, and integrated EPCS-certified E-Prescribing (eRx). Patients benefit from the ease of a patient engagement portal and check-in features.

RXNT's EMR solution is HIPAA compliant, supports MACRA and MIPS, and is an ONC certified HIT solution.

Chiropractic offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including: compilation of chiropractic SOAP notes and patient report generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, chiropractic practice management, electronic claims, collections and financial reporting.
